amendment.description: Amendment allows the National Guard to use appropriated funds to cover the costs of conducting and participating in athletic competitions and small arms competitions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 107-450 to authorize the National Guard to use its appropriated funds to cover the costs of conducting and participating in athletic events relevant to military duties or military physical fitness requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 412 - 2 (Roll no. 156).
